src:
Cedevita Olimpija vpisala prvo zmago v evropskem pokalu

06 Nov 2019, 19:39


Istanbul, 6. novembra - Košarkarji Cedevite Olimpije so v 6. krogu evropskega pokala (skupina C) premagali Darušafako s 76:72 (19:25, 46:39, 63:60).



Hrvaška, Zagreb. Košarka, košarkarski obroč, košarkarska žoga, koš.Foto: Hina/STA Arhiv Hina/STA

* Dvorana Volkswagen, gledalcev 1500, sodniki: Perez (Španija), Papapetrou (Grčija), Fritz (Nemčija).* Darušafaka: Agva 3 (1:2), Browne 17 (3:4), Hamilton 12, Veyseloglu 2, Ozdemiroglu 10 (3:4), Lamb 11 (1:2), Jones 10 (1:1), Guler 3 (1:2), Colson 4.* Cedevita Olimpija: Krušlin 17, Boatright 6 (4:5), Hopkins 15 (1:2), Murić 2, Miller-McIntyre 11 (1:2), Blažič 10 (4:7), Stpanović 8 (0:2), Simonović 3, Zirbes 4.* Prosti meti: Darušafaka 10:15, Cedevita Olimpija 11:18.* Met za tri točke: Darušafaka 6:24 (Browne 2, Lamb 2, Jones, Ozdemiroglu), Cedevita Olimpija 9:27 (Krušlin 5, Hopkins 2, Miller-McIntyre, Simonović).* Osebne napake: Darušafaka 20, Cedevita Olimpija 22.* Pet osebnih: /.
Košarkarji Cedevite Olimpije so v šestem nastopu zabeležili prvo zmago v evropskem pokalu. Na gostovanju v Istanbulu so premagali Darušafako s 76:72.
Ljubljančani ostajajo na zadnjem mestu v skupini C, vendar imajo zdaj precej bolj realne možnosti za osvojitev enega od prvih štirih mest, ki vodijo v nadaljnje tekmovanje. Na roko jim gre tudi razpored v zadnjih štirih krogih, saj bodo le enkrat gostovali. Naslednji teden bodo v Stožicah gostili ruski Kazan.
Cedevita Olimpija je bila v evropskem pokalu že nekajkrat blizu zmage, vendar je danes prvič dobro odigrala vseh štirideset minut in v ključnih zadnjih minutah ohranila zbranost ter natančnost.
Nekaj slabih minut je imela le v prvi četrtini, ko so domači pobegnili na 24:13, vendar jih je že do odmora ujela z delnim izidom 23:7 ter v 26. minuti povedla s 57:46.
Nekaj trenutkov je izgledalo, da se bo zgodba o preobratih znova ponovila, saj je Darušafaka v dobri minuti prišla na 57:54, toda tokrat je imel trener Slaven Rimac dovolj razpoloženih, predvsem pa odgovornih igralcev.
Mikael Hopkins, Jaka Blažič in Codi Miller-McIntyre so v odločilnih trenutkih zadeli koš, ob tem pa tudi uspešno odigrali v obrambi, tako da Turki niso prišli bližje kot na dva koša zaostanka.
Prvi strelec Cedevite Olimpije je bil Filip Krušlin s 17 točkami (trojke 5:8), odlično partijo pa je prikazal tudi organizator igre Codi Miller-McIntyre, ki je zbral enajst točk (met iz igre 4:10), deset skokov, devet podaj in štiri ukradene žoge (indeks 25). Mikael Hopkins je prispeval 15 točk (za dve točki 4:4, trojke 2:3), Jaka Blažič pa deset (6 skokov).
text:
Cedevita Olympia registers first victory in European Cup

06 Nov 2019, 18:39


Istanbul, November 6 - Cedevita Olympia basketball players beat Darushafaka 76:72 (19:25, 46:39, 63:60) in the 6th round of the European Cup (Group C).



Croatia, Zagreb. Basketball, basketball hoop, basketball, basket.Photo: Hina / STA Archive Hina / STA

* Volkswagen Hall, 1500 spectators, judges: Perez (Spain), Papapetrou (Greece), Fritz (Germany). * Darushafaka: Agva 3 (1: 2), Browne 17 (3: 4), Hamilton 12, Veyseloglu 2, Ozdemiroglu 10 (3: 4), Lamb 11 (1: 2), Jones 10 (1: 1), Guler 3 (1: 2), Colson 4. * Cedevita Olympia: Krushlin 17, Boatright 6 (4: 5), Hopkins 15 (1: 2), Muric 2, Miller-McIntyre 11 (1: 2), Blazic 10 (4: 7), Stpanovic 8 (0: 2), Simonovic 3, Zirbes 4. * Free throws: Darushafak 10:15 , Cedevita Olympia 11: 18. * Three-point meth: Darushafak 6:24 (Browne 2, Lamb 2, Jones, Ozdemiroglu), Cedevita Olympia 9:27 (Kruslin 5, Hopkins 2, Miller-McIntyre, Simonovic). * Personal mistakes: Darushafaka 20, Cedevita Olympia 22. * Five personal: /.
Cedevita Olympia basketball players recorded their first European Cup win in their sixth appearance. They beat Darushafaka 76:72 in a visit to Istanbul.
Ljubljana remain in last place in Group C, but now have a much more realistic chance of winning one of the first four places leading to further competition. They also have a hand in the schedule of the last four rounds, as they will only be roaming once. Next week the Russian Kazan will be hosted in Stozice.
Cedevita Olympia was close to winning the European Cup a few times, but for the first time today it played well for all forty minutes and maintained its clarity and precision in the crucial last minutes.
She had some bad minutes only in the first quarter, when the home side escaped at 24:13, but by the break had caught them with a partial outcome of 23: 7 and led in the 26th minute with 57:46.
For a while, it looked like the turnaround story would be repeated again, with Darushafaka coming in at 57:54 for a good minute, but this time the coach, Slaven Rimac, was in a good mood and most of all the responsible players.
Mikael Hopkins, Jaka Blazic and Codi Miller-McIntyre hit the basket at crucial moments, but also successfully played defense so that the Turks came no closer than two points behind.
Cedevita Olympia's first scorer was Filip Kruslin with 17 points (5: 8 threes), and the game was also played by Codi Miller-McIntyre, who tallied eleven points (4:10), ten rebounds, nine passes and four steals (index 25). Mikael Hopkins contributed 15 points (4: 4 for two points, 2: 3 threes) and Jaka Blazic scored ten (6 rebounds).
